Type of participation: Coordinador técnico
Contribution to the project: Idea and Technical Coordinator. I selected, trained and directed to interns who
created the platform. I made the proposal of the project With Marta Berrocal, me as technical coordinator and
she as Principal Investigator. I applied my knowledge of non immersive virtual worlds to create a Educational
Platform based on virtual worlds, being therefore a key figure for the project, as seen in the project proposal (see
http://innovacioneducativa.upm.es/proyectosIE/informa tion? anyo = 2010-2011 & id = 286) which states: "The
viability of this project would be subject to fund Mariano Rico as technical coordinator of this project. Failure to
financed is considered that the project is not viable".
